"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b1dba563687256d90006b4#post_55b1dba563687256d90006b4
I just don't want yet another gun related argument. I'm so freaking sick of it, to the point where I honestly feel less sympathy for the shooting itself and more annoyance for the inevitable controversy following it.

If you can be civil, fine, but I'm just sick of hearing about it.

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b1dba563687256d90006b4#post_55b1dba563687256d90006b4
Doesn't require, yes, But they still have a record of who they sold it too. You still have to fill out a mountain of paperwork before the buyer can take the product home. And you still need a state issued permit before you can buy one.

You've never ACTUALLY been to a Gun and Knife Show before have you?
